subject: Pharmacy at your service
body:
Dear customer.
Wanna save on the medications you buy on the Internet but afraid that it might be dangerous for your health? It won't be with our discount Canadian pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy has got all the medications one might need to solve his/her health problems. All the drugs offered at CanadianPharmacy have passed our strict quality check and proved to be 100% generic. Don't waste your money on the medications of questionable quality shop at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Yours faithfully,Brock Moseley
